name: Goroons
description: GOROONS is a teamwork-based adventure where you have to combine your unique skills and overcome tough-as-nails puzzle challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any quadcore processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: On-board graphics set as "performance" Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Core i5 or i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any off-board graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
